title: How many games do I need to play with a ranked team to get the rewards for it this season (5)
body: Question in title. Is it still a thing or did they change it?

replies.body:
In teams you get the free ward skin for 10 wins. You get a better looking ward skin for 25 wins and a even better one for 50 wins. Something like that.

To get the free champion and skin you need to be Gold or higher in solo que.
Isn't it just Gold tier in ranked?{{item:3504}}

i think its based on points earned. points are earned through winning matches after placement (1 per match i believe). 30 is the beginning (if im wrong im sorry ver l8 and cant b bothered looking) and 150 is max. my team is on 0 after 3 matches :(
